content:

inventory=[{"type": "iron_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 43, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 33, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an acacia boat, I need to first craft some acacia planks from the acacia log. Therefore, I will move one acacia log from slot 27 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: acacia_boat

thought: The acacia planks have been crafted and are in the craft slot (0), so I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

thought: To craft an acacia boat, I need to craft acacia planks first. The crafting recipe for acacia planks requires placing 1 acacia log into the crafting grid. I will move the acacia log from slot 27 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 4
